channel.title: LifeAfterDeath is searching some Staff!
channel.description:
Hey!
I am creating a new server called LifeAfterDeath. Unforunately, I cannot host. Therefore, I would want to find someone who possibly has a VPS and that could host this server. Props of the job:
- You're given the rank of owner - You participate and have a veto right in all server activities - 100% of donations (my estimations are 50$ after 1st month and 150$ per month after) go to you. I do not ask any at all.
If you want to be hoster, please fill in the following:
Age: Country: VPS capacity:
Server will be based either off Devolution or maybe Delta. Anyways, it will be completely different to any server, since I intend to make a lot of changes.
Also, I need a coder. I am a pretty good coder myself, but I would want another coder, who is good with clients, to support me in case I have a problem. If you want to be a part of the team, please fill in the following:
Age: Country: Experience: Past accomplishments(optionnal):
Mods will be chosen based on activity on server and respect of others and of the rules.
Thanks,
Vrac

@si_force wrote:

Alright, thanks for understanding. Topic locked.

Hey!

I am creating a new server called LifeAfterDeath. Unforunately, I cannot host. Therefore, I would want to find someone who possibly has a VPS and that could host this server. Props of the job:

  • You’re given the rank of owner

If you want to be hoster, please fill in the following:

Server will be based either off Devolution or maybe Delta. Anyways, it will be completely different to any server, since I intend to make a lot of changes.

Also, I need a coder. I am a pretty good coder myself, but I would want another coder, who is good with clients, to support me in case I have a problem. If you want to be a part of the team, please fill in the following:
